title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.13 - Authorization to make a criminal complaint
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.13 - Authorization to make a criminal complaint

State Regulations

Every pier superintendent having overall charge or
supervision of the operations of the pier or other waterfront terminal who is
employed by a carrier of freight by water having the responsibility of
safeguarding waterborne freight shall furnish the commission with the name of
the person or persons in the employ of the carrier of freight by water
authorized by the carrier to make a criminal complaint in connection with cargo
stolen from the custody of the said carrier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
